name: Clowns With Guns
description:
A Game made for the 2017 Shenanijam!

The sprites, the music, and the game itself were all created by one person, Sad Waters.

Clowns With Guns is a game where you play as a serial murderer clown that has to kill every person in the area before the night is over. 

Oh, and it was also created in just 48 hours. It took over my entire weekend but it was definitely worth it.
